I have not been able to sleep since half past two o'clock. Now you have the opportunity while with your brethren to exemplify to them that 


                                     -239- 

faith, that dependence, that confidence in God that He will give you wisdom from His own fountain of wisdom. We are now where we need to know for our individual selves the mind and will and ways of God's working; and simple seeking to know for yourselves what God has to say to you will bring to you light and assurance and knowledge.
